Synonyms.Synonym: Holmium laser enucleation of the prostate - discharge
Photoselective vaporization of the prostate - discharge

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Prostate resection - minimally invasive - discharge
QAPair.Answer: You had minimally invasive prostate resection surgery to remove part of your prostate gland because it was enlarged. This article tells you what you need to know to take care of yourself as you recover from the procedure.
